title: Arthur, The Complete Season 13 (SD iTunes WEB-DL)
description:
Arthur, The Complete Season 13 (SD iTunes WEB-DL)

A six-time Emmy Award winner, this daily animated series, based on Marc Brown's best-selling Arthur adventure books, shows how Arthur and his friends use effective, age-appropriate problem-solving skills. In Season 13, the series once again takes on a difficult topic that impacts kids and their parents in a profound way Ã¢â‚¬â€ cancer. Lance Armstrong returns to Elwood City for the two-part episode "The Great MacGrady," about an illness that affects the lives of so many children. Also in Season 13, Academy Award-winning actor Philip Seymour Hoffman lends his voice as director Will Toffman in "No Acting Please," a unique premiere episode about theater and the joy of the performing arts.


All episodes come from the iTunes Store, with all the iTunes metadata, and most of them with subtitles in CC format.

If you need to use this files as MP4s, change the extension.
